changelogButtonTitle.description: Text displayed in the extension notification to open changelog page.

enableButtonTitle.description: Text displayed in the extension notification to enable the extension.

enabledExtensionMessage.description: Text displayed in the extension enabled notification. Expects extension name to be passed in.

extDescription.message: Show a notification when an extension is updated.

websiteButtonTitle.description: Text displayed in the extension update notification to visit the website.

loadingMessageText.description: Text displayed in the changelog when retrieving changelog.

requestPermissionsText.description: Text displayed in the changelog when additional permissions are requested.
requestPermissionsText.message: This experimental feature requests an additional permission to the Chrome Web Store.

showChangelogButtonText.description: Text displayed in the changelog button to request permissions.

sorryMessageText.description: Text displayed in the changelog when there is no changelog provided.
sorryMessageText.message: Sorry... there is no changelog available at this time.

updatedExtensionMessage.description: Text displayed in the extension notification. Expects extension name, old version and version to be passed in.
updatedExtensionMessage.message: $extensionName$ has been updated from v.$extensionOldVersion$ to v.$extensionVersion$.

updatedExtensionTitle.description: Title displayed in the extension notification. Expects extension name to be passed in.

welcomeText.description: Text displayed in the welcome notification.
welcomeText.message: You'll be notified as soon as an extension is updated.

welcomeTitle.description: Title displayed in the welcome notification.

newOptionsText.description: Text displayed in the new options notification.
newOptionsText.message: You can disable extensions and apps when autoupdated.

newOptionsTitle.description: Title displayed in the new options notification.
